body:
I think I had the same error during testing. After I set RAYPATH to the lib
folder in the new installation it worked fine. Is your RAYPATH set
correctly at the cmd prompt? I also did not use any arguments like "-m 1"
for testing.

Thomas

On Fri, Jul 20, 2012 at 5:54 PM, Guglielmetti, Robert <
Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov> wrote:
